Logistics Cluster

Year in Review 2016

scroll down

Central African Republic (CAR)

Complex protracted emergency

The Logistics Cluster has been playing an important role in supporting organisations to identify gaps and optimise the use of resources available at regional and local levels.

Due to insufficient funding, the Logistics Cluster has been operating with minimal staff throughout 2016, restricting the effectiveness of critical coordination efforts
and the capacity to provide real-time information and data to the humanitarian community.

*[OCHA, November 2016]
2.2 million people in need of humanitarian assistance*
